text: William Rufus Dickie (February 20, 1916 — December 23, 1997) was a Canadian professional ice hockey goaltender who played for the Chicago Black Hawks in the National Hockey League during the 1941–42 NHL season for one game. ==Other websites== * * * ==References== Category:1916 births Category:1997 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey goaltenders Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Ice hockey people from New Brunswick
title: Bill Dickie
